shrimp.name: Blotches
shrimp.author: rconstruct
shrimp.usage: Generates random blotches, based on single feature Voronoi cell noise. "Jitter" controls the Voronoi cell noise jittering, generating a less or more evenly distribution of blotches. "Offset" controls the center offset, a value of 0 generating a hollow blotch, and 1.0 an solid blotch. "Radius" controls the radius, and "frequency", the frequency of the blotches. "Dtype" controls the distance metric used for the Voronoi noise, when different than 0 the metric being the Minkowski metric, with "dtype" as Minkowski's P parameter, being P = 1, the Manhattan metric, P = 2 the Euclidian metric, and allowing higher orders of P tending towards Tchebychev results.
